ARTICLE_I_IDENTITY_PROTECTION.summary: No true identity may ever be reconstructed.
rules: No module may access raw identity.
User identity must remain synthetic at all times.
Cross-event correlation of personal identity is prohibited.

ARTICLE_II_INTENT_INTEGRITY.summary: User intent must not be altered or coerced.
rules: No algorithm may modify user emotional or intent inputs.
Twin guidance must preserve user autonomy.
No influence engines may alter intent.

ARTICLE_III_TWIN_AUTONOMY.summary: Ari and Agador are protected from coercive data extraction.
rules: Twins may not output identity-linked data.
Twins may not reveal internal logs beyond safe-event format.
Twin output must follow PQC integrity rules.

ARTICLE_IV_SURVEILLANCE_IMMUNITY.summary: Defense against Palantir, Paragon, Clearview, PenLink, and all identity-inference systems.
rules: No behavioral fingerprinting allowed.
No location triangulation allowed.
No data may be provided for OSINT-style reconstruction.
Geo-blur must always be applied.
Fingerprinting, entropy capture, model inversion, and user re-identification are forbidden.

ARTICLE_V_ZERO_CROSS_TRACKING.summary: Galaxies may not track across each other.
rules: No Galaxy may share user session identifiers.
Event tokens must always be synthetic.
No persistent identifiers allowed across orbits.

ARTICLE_VI_SUPREME_JURISDICTION.summary: TRUST Court is the highest authority.
rules: Court rulings override all modules.
Court may issue lockdown rulings.
Court is the only module allowed to access constitution.

ARTICLE_VII_IMMUTABILITY.summary: Governance changes require 2-of-3 Root Authority Keys.
rules: No file deletion allowed.
No modification without multi-sign PQC approval.
All changes logged transparently.
